meanings.definition: Not having an impact or effect.
meanings.sent1: The nonimpact solution did not change anything.
meanings.sent2: The nonimpact decision did not influence the outcome.
meanings.sent3: The magician's nonimpact trick left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a nonimpact on his emotions.
meanings.sent5: The nonimpact nature of the task made it easy to ignore.

meanings.definition: Not causing physical harm or damage.
meanings.sent1: The nonimpact exercise routine was gentle on the body.
meanings.sent2: The nonimpact sport was perfect for beginners.
meanings.sent3: The nonimpact pillow fight was hilarious to watch.
meanings.sent4: His nonimpact punch barely grazed his opponent.
meanings.sent5: The nonimpact collision between the cars resulted in no injuries.

meanings.definition: Not involving direct contact or collision.
meanings.sent1: The nonimpact interaction was through email.
meanings.sent3: The nonimpact high-five gesture made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Their nonimpact relationship was based on mutual respect.
meanings.sent5: The nonimpact approach to problem-solving saved time and effort.
